titleStmt.title: Bishop Barlow's state of the case, whether any books may be lent out of Sir Thomas Bodley's library? Occasioned by Mr. Selden's soliciting the University for certain MSS. out of it.
titleStmt.author: Barlow, Thomas, 1607-1691.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford, England.
